content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(41.0, -80.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 41.0, -80.0) which is currently working and processing copper ore.
- Stone furnace (position 42.0, -79.0) which is full of coal and cannot accept more items.

### Copper ore mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of:
- Copper ore patch where copper ore is harvested.

### Coal mine at position(34.5, -89.5)
Consists of:
- Coal patch where coal is harvested.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items into a full inventory
- Ensure that the target entity (like a furnace) has available space before attempting to insert items. Check the inventory status of the entity before insertion.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to crafting
- Verify the required ingredients and ensure that the crafting entity has the necessary resources before attempting to craft items.
